summary: Frontend Engineer (React Experience) with hands-on experience building React and Next.js applications using TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3 and the Node.js (Express) ecosystem. Experienced in Git-based workflows, Docker deployments, and integrating REST APIs and PostgreSQL for scalable frontend solutions.

bullets: Did build a flash SMS notification system using Next.js and TypeScript with GatewayAPI and PostgreSQL
Did deploy a self-hosted production server using Docker on Linux and manage environment stability
Did integrate Windows Active Directory for school-wide authentication
Did develop features for the Beautifi web app using React.js with PostgreSQL and Kysely
Did integrate PHP and JavaScript with WordPress Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) for Sitings.ca
Did contribute to Shopify theme development using Liquid
Did build an internal email template management tool using Express.js with a custom React.js interface
Did integrate Zoho API to autofill employee personal information for email templates
Did develop a customer management and go-kart booking system using TypeScript, Next.js, and Prisma
Did implement customer data handling and session scheduling features using Next.js and TypeScript
Did build a flash SMS sending system using Next.js, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL
Did deploy the solution on a self-hosted Linux server using Docker
Did build a real estate location analysis and site selection tool using PHP, JavaScript, and WordPress ACF
Did optimize the platform for performance and efficient filtering using JavaScript and ACF
